creator: ranu.kumar@xansa.com
text:
we are having problem with apache proxy.we have two managed server(WLS1 and 
WLS2)weblogic server.which communicated though apache server.when we run both 
of the weblogic server the session timout occured...where its works when we 
shout down the fist managed server.

we checked all the log files but did't get any clue.

Any help or clue why we are having this problem ?
Imeediate respose will be apprecieted.

Thanks in advance!!

Ranu Kumar
